Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user or IP address uses an app that is not sanctioned to perform an activity that resembles an attempt to exfiltrate information from your organization.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Data Exfiltration to Unsanctioned Apps
Query: sourcetype="m365-threat_management" eventsource="SecurityComplianceCenter" eventname="Data exfiltration to unsanctioned apps" status="success"
